trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Ripon
There were no other sightings in Ripon on or around May 24th 2009
divs: sighting detailsthis is how it went down, i was skywatching as always seeing as ufo's are frequent around here and i happened to notice a light on the ground about half a mile away from me. now as you watch the videos, i could almost swear this is the white balls that are flying around, as i will donate another hundred reports on those guys. only difference is it was on the ground doing funny stuff this time, and this isnt the only time i've seen them on the ground around me, just the best video footage i have of the subject at hand. i am not looney, might use some drugs once in a while but i have very nice cameras that will astound the fools of our planet. to be honest i dont know why i stopped recording, other than to pull out the telescope but i should have let the camera roll. through the telescope you see all of what you see here and more, this is fascinating and i see them alot. sometimes in the air they will do the same things but its usually a small something that comes in before a bigger craft does. enjoy!! 1. where was i? in my yard 2. what made me notice it? i was looking 3. what did i think? man i need the camera on this thing 4. describe the actions? this object appeared to morph within itself and continuously change all within a bubble 5. my feelings, reactions and actions? i felt really good for having the opportunity to take this shot, reacted by grabbing the tripod and camera and proceeded to take the video you are hopefully gonna watch 6. how did i lose sight? you know i really dont remember now i'm not going to attach the video since my internet isnt the greatest, but those of you smart enough can copy and paste this link to your browser. the first is the original, the second is the super tweaked version using hsl adjust in sony hd vegas. http:\\www.youtube.com\user\cryinthabluze?feature=mhw4 tweaked http:\\www.youtube.com\user\cryinthabluze?feature=mhw4#p\u\20\01gz558dht8 i will donate more soon
